pr_title: [FLINK-18313][doc] Update Hive dialect doc about VIEW

timeline.message: alter view not supported in SQL client

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            **NOTE**: Altering view only works with table API, not supported via SQL client.
          
          
            
            **NOTE**: Altering view only works in Table API, but not supported via SQL client.
timeline.author: wuchong
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -272,6 +272,8 @@ CREATE VIEW [IF NOT EXISTS] view_name [(column_name, ...) ]
 
 #### Alter
 
+**NOTE**: Altering view only works with table API, not supported via SQL client.
